baseQuestion.prompt: Have any of your natural parents or siblings, before the age of 60, died or suffered from cancer, heart disease, stroke, diabetes, kidney disease, Parkinson's disease, Alzheimer's disease or any other hereditary disease or disorder?

你曾否患上糖尿病、腎病、腎衰竭、肝炎或肝部發炎、心臟病、中風、多發性硬化、肺病或呼吸限制、癱瘓、任何癌症或腫瘤，及／或任何先天病徵（自出生以來已存在的身體或精神缺陷或病徵）？

heading.text: Have you ever had or been treated for any conditions or symptoms relating to:

baseQuestion.prompt: cancer, enlarged nodes, unusual skin lesions, tumours, polyps, cysts or other growths?
high blood pressure or high cholesterol?
diabetes, elevated or raised blood sugar, thyroid disorders or any other disease or disorder of the endocrine system?
hepatitis B or C, fatty liver, abnormal or elevated liver function, gallstones, gastritis, duodenal or stomach ulcer or any other disease or disorder of the digestive system?
heart attack, chest pain or discomfort, irregular heart beat, heart valve disorder, heart murmur, palpitations or any other disease or disorder of the blood vessel or heart?
stroke, epilepsy, fits, paralysis or weakness of limb, head injury or any other disease or disorder of the neurological system?
asthma, bronchitis, pneumonia, tuberculosis, emphysema or any other disease or disorder of the lungs and respiratory system?

kidney infection, kidney stones, urinary tract infection, urinary incontinence, blood in urine, protein in urine or sugar in urine or any other disease or disorder of the kidney, bladder, genital or urinary systems?
arthritis, gout, osteoporosis, slipped disc or any other disorder, pain or injury to the muscles, bones, limbs, joints or spine (back or neck)?
anaemia, haemophilia, thalassaemia or any other disease or disorder of the blood?
Systemic Lupus Erythematosus, Crohn's disease, Ulcerative Colitis or any other autoimmune disease or disorder?
eye, ear, nose or throat disease or disorder (excluding sight problems corrected by prescription lenses)?
depression, anxiety, nervous breakdown or any other nervous or mental disorders?
any other illness, disorder, operation, physical disability or injury not mentioned above?
Have you or your spouse or partner been told to have, or received any medical advice, counseling or treatment in connection with sexually transmitted diseases, including HIV and AIDS?
Are you currently pregnant?

heading.text: Aside from what you have already told us,
